metadata.title: CVE-2020-21710 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A divide by zero issue discovered in eps_print_page in gdevepsn.c inArtifex Software GhostScript 9.50 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service via opening of crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21710` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.4
ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.4
libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.4
libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.4').
